system.availability: A user that possesses this tome gains +30 to Scholastic Lore (Legend, Numerology, Occult), and Trade (Soothsayer) Tests, but if they fail that test by more degrees than their Wilpower Bonus, they gain one Insanity Point.
system.cost: A Tome penned by an infamous witch-cabal on Footfall that covers methods of Astrology and divination. Somewhat Heretical.
